content: The second AEROPLANE on the right is under-segmented in the prediction mask, while the bottom parts of the scene are completely misclassified as AEROPLANE.

The ground truth AEROPLANE region has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries and details are missed, the PERSON region near the bottom-left edge is also under-segmented and the background has been misclassified as PERSON.
The prediction mask is quite chaotic. The DOG region has been partially misclassified as CHAIR and SOFA. Some BACKGROUND regions on the top of the CHAIR have also been misclassified as SOFA.

The ground truth TRAIN region has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries and the regions near the center are under-segmented a bit. The BACKGROUND areas that interact with the region have been misclassified as BACKGROUND.

The PERSON region has been under-segmented at the top, and the boundaries on the left and bottom are also less accurate. The hand holding the glass on the left has been partly misclassified as BACKGROUND, and the BOTTLE regions in the background have been almost completely missed.

The BICYCLE region has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries, appearing incomplete at the bottom. The BACKGROUND areas interacting with the region have been misclassified as BICYCLE, especially at the top.

The ground truth TVMONITOR region has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries, especially across the top of both monitors. There is also a misclassification of some areas above the top of the right monitor.

The ground truth TRAIN region on the right and on the left of the scene has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries; in particular, the boundaries between the two TRAIN instances are blurred and the BACKGROUND areas that interact with the TRAIN regions have been completely misclassified as TRAIN.

The ground truth BOAT region has been segmented with slightly inaccurate boundaries, especially at the top of the boat on the right, and the prediction mask of the left boat is incomplete. In addition, the pole on the right boat is missing on the prediction mask.
The BIRD region in the prediction mask shows some under-segmentation compared to the ground truth mask, specifically some BACKGROUND areas have been misclassified as BIRD.
The ground truth AEROPLANE region has been segmented with somewhat inaccurate boundaries, most of the fine details being completely missed.
The prediction mask is missing the boundary between the two PERSON regions, and is less accurate on the external boundaries of the regions.

The ground truth TVMONITOR region on the left is well segmented, while the corresponding prediction mask presents some defects on its right boundary. The prediction also misses the TVMONITOR region on the right almost completely, and erroneously segments some BACKGROUND pixels as TVMONITOR.

The prediction of the SHEEP region on the center of the scene has a lower coverage than the ground truth. There is under-segmentation on the boundary of the region, especially around the ears on both sides and the legs on the lower left.

The ground truth DININGTABLE region on the bottom has been segmented with an inaccurate boundary, and the BACKGROUND regions that interact with the DININGTABLE region in the center of the scene have been misclassified as DININGTABLE.
The BOTTLE region has been segmented with more detail.

The ground truth BOTTLE region on the left has been segmented with less accurate boundaries, and is under-segmented a bit. The BACKGROUND areas that interact with the region have been completely misclassified as BOTTLE.

The PERSON region in the upper right of the scene has been segmented with a coarser boundary in the prediction, missing part of the head. The MOTORBIKE regions have slightly over-extended boundaries on the left.
The prediction of the BIRD region has coarser boundaries than the ground truth, resulting in a loss of detail, especially on the wings.

The central ground truth BOAT region has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries and the prediction of the leftmost boat is incomplete. Also the upper part of the central BOAT prediction is overly coarse.
The ground truth TRAIN region has been segmented with somewhat inaccurate boundaries, especially the regions closer to the top, and these tend to be slightly over-extended.
The prediction captured most of the ground truth CAT region, but the tail on the right side is slightly over-segmented and has inaccurate boundaries.
The prediction is missing almost all of the BICYCLE regions, except for a small PERSON region that has been misclassified on the right.

The prediction mask shows some significant deviations from the ground truth. The COW region is broken and some parts are missing and hallucinated with HORSE parts, while HORSE regions have been hallucinated on the PERSON region.

The ground truth CAT region on the center of the scene has been segmented with more accurate boundaries than the prediction. In the prediction, the bottom region of the cat is slightly under-segmented.

Overall, the prediction captures the general areas of PERSON, however, the regions are largely incomplete. Specifically, several regions are missing around the center of the scene. The prediction also hallucinates some BICYCLE regions on the right of the palm tree. The other person regions are also fragmented and less complete than in the ground truth.

The ground truth PERSON region has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries and the right part of the region has been over-extended, while some of the armpits of the PERSON are missing in the prediction.
The BUS region in the prediction mask is slightly over-extended, especially along the bottom and sides, and lacks the crisp boundaries of the ground truth mask.
The MOTORBIKE region has been segmented with less accurate boundaries, especially the boundaries corresponding to the ground and towards the top-right are flawed.
The ground truth CAT region on the center of the scene has been segmented with more accurate boundaries than the prediction. The top boundary of the region is flawed on the prediction.

Overall, the prediction captures most of the ground truth TRAIN region, however, the top of the train near the center of the scene has been under-segmented, while the right edge of the same TRAIN region is slightly incomplete. Also, a small region of the TRAIN is misclassified as HORSE on the right.
The prediction mask is very close to the ground truth BUS region, with slight under-segmentation on the top right of the bus.
The ground truth BOAT region on the center of the scene has been segmented with a smoother boundary. The prediction mask's lower boundary is coarser and more irregular.
The ground truth TRAIN region on the right of the scene has been segmented with somewhat coarser and imperfect boundaries. The upper and bottom boundaries of the region are especially flawed.
The PERSON region's right leg is incomplete in the prediction mask. The CHAIR region has been over-extended in the prediction, especially on its left side.
The ground truth SOFA region on the bottom-left has been segmented with coarse boundaries, and the prediction's boundaries are even more irregular.

The ground truth COW region has been segmented with somewhat coarser and imperfect boundaries, especially in the legs, and is also under-segmented near the left edge. The BACKGROUND area that interacts with the region in that area has been completely misclassified as COW.
The PERSON regions have been segmented with inaccurate boundaries, especially on the bottom, and the CHAIR region has been misclassified as PERSON.
The prediction of the CHAIR regions is highly fragmented and inaccurate. The DININGTABLE region has been over-extended downwards, and the boundaries are blurry.

The prediction of the TRAIN region on the scene is incomplete and inaccurate. A significant portion of the TRAIN on the left has been misclassified, partly as AEROPLANE and partly as BACKGROUND. The boundary of the predicted TRAIN region is quite irregular, especially on the right side.

The DOG region in the prediction mask is under-segmented. Furthermore, the prediction mask hallucinates multiple BICYCLE regions on the bottom of the image.
The TVMONITOR region on the top left of the scene has not been detected in the prediction.
The MOTORBIKE region is slightly over-segmented in the prediction, extending a bit more to the bottom, whereas, on the right, the PERSON region is under-segmented.
The CHAIR region in the bottom right is over-extended, and has somewhat inaccurate boundaries. The DININGTABLE region is incomplete.

The prediction of the SOFA region is incomplete, with many hallucinated AEROPLANE regions towards the top of the scene. Moreover, the DOG region has been over-segmented and hallucinated in the regions surrounding it as a SOFA.

Overall, the prediction captures the ground truth HORSE region with acceptable accuracy. The boundaries are well-defined and follow the shape of the horse's head closely. The only significant deviation is at the top of the head, the region boundary is slightly less smooth.
The BOAT region on the left side of the scene is significantly under-segmented. Furthermore, the PERSON region near the center of the scene is partially missing from the prediction mask.

The ground truth HORSE region has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries, especially at the bottom. The region behind the pole is under-segmented. The ground truth PERSON region has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries and is under-segmented on the lower-left.

The ground truth CAT region on the center of the scene has been segmented with slightly inaccurate boundaries, especially on the paw near the bottom-center. Also, the region near the top-left corner has been under-segmented.

The MONITOR regions have been segmented with inaccurate boundaries, especially on the top. Additionally, some regions above the bookshelf in the BACKGROUND have been misclassified as BICYCLE, while areas between the MONITORs and around the PERSON have been misclassified as BACKGROUND. The PERSON region has been well segmented, although its lower-right boundary is not as smooth.

The prediction of the CHAIR region is quite incomplete, and significantly under-segmented. The TABLE region is fragmented into smaller regions, and the PERSON region at the center-right is somewhat over-segmented, with inaccurate boundaries on the top right.

The prediction of the PERSON regions on the center of the scene has some inaccurate boundaries, especially at the bottom part where some BACKGROUND areas have been misclassified as PERSON. The CHAIR regions between the PERSON regions have not been detected at all and are misclassified as BACKGROUND. The TVMONITOR region on the left is not captured completely in the prediction mask, and the BACKGROUND areas on the bottom right and left of the scene have been misclassified as DININGTABLE.

The prediction captured the overall CAT region, but the boundaries of the region are quite inaccurate. Also, the CAT prediction includes some regions that are clearly not part of the cat, in particular on the lower left and above the cat's head.

The prediction mask of the ground truth SHEEP region on the center of the scene is inaccurate and fragmented, most of it being misclassified as DOG. Also, smaller regions have been hallucinated and assigned to the classes BIRD, and POTTEDPLANT.

The PERSON regions around the top and left side of the scene are under-segmented, especially on the left edge and the MOTORBIKE region on the center of the scene has been segmented with somewhat coarser boundaries.
The prediction incorrectly identifies the COW region as AEROPLANE and BOTTLE.
The prediction is inaccurate; the ground truth BOAT region on the scene has been incorrectly classified as BIRD in certain locations, especially on the top of the BOAT.

The ground truth SHEEP region has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries and the bottom region is under-segmented. The BACKGROUND areas that interact with the region have been completely misclassified as SHEEP.

The prediction mask of the ground truth COW region is inaccurate. Many areas inside the COW region have been misclassified as HORSE and BOTTLE, while some BACKGROUND areas have been misclassified as COW.

The CAT region in the prediction mask is slightly under-segmented on the top left compared to the ground truth. Some of the BACKGROUND has been misclassified as CAT in the prediction mask on the top left as well.

The ground truth SHEEP region is significantly under-segmented in the prediction, especially towards the top, where most of it is misclassified as BACKGROUND. Furthermore, the hand in the lower left corner, part of which belongs to PERSON, has been misclassified as SHEEP.
The ground truth BUS region has been segmented with a coarse boundary on the bottom; the prediction is under-segmented.

The prediction missed most of the DININGTABLE region, hallucinating a POTTEDPLANT region instead, which does not exist in the ground truth. The prediction mask also has less accurate boundaries for CHAIR, showing an irregular segmentation of the regions, especially on the right.
The CAR region on the bottom right of the scene has been segmented with coarser boundaries, especially on the rightmost boundary.

The SOFA region is fragmented around the PERSON region, with several small regions of SOFA appearing where PERSON should be, and vice versa. The boundary between the SOFA and PERSON classes is poorly defined in the prediction.
The ground truth AEROPLANE region has been segmented with somewhat coarser, less defined boundaries, especially on the top.

The ground truth COW region on the center of the scene has been segmented with imperfect boundaries, especially on the bottom. Some BACKGROUND areas interacting with the COW region have been completely misclassified as COW.

The ground truth BOTTLE region has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries, specifically missing the bottom part of the bottle in the prediction. The top part is over-segmented, with hallucinated regions that do not exist in the ground truth.

The predicted BOAT region has a similar shape to the ground truth region, but the PERSON region in the boat is misclassified as part of the BOAT region. The top part of the predicted BOAT region also extends further than the ground truth BOAT region.

The prediction of the BOTTLE region in the center is over-extended at the bottom. Furthermore, the glasses at the bottom-left have been partially misclassified as BOTTLE. There are regions of DININGTABLE under the left glass that were also misclassified as BOTTLE.

The CAT region has been segmented with acceptable boundaries, though there are some areas around the left leg and the leftmost CHAIR leg where the prediction is missing small parts of the ground truth. The PERSON on the right is truncated and has not been segmented correctly in the prediction.
The prediction of the DOG region has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries. The AEROPLANE, PERSON and BACKGROUND areas that interact with the region have been completely misclassified.
The prediction of the AEROPLANE region is missing the tail of the plane on the right, and there are inaccuracies along the bottom edge. Also, the PERSON on the stairs has been poorly segmented.

The PERSON region on the left side of the scene is under-segmented by the prediction. Also, the POTTEDPLANT region on the far left is missing in the prediction, and the potted plant in the middle-right side has been under-segmented.

The ground truth PERSON region has been segmented with slightly inaccurate boundaries and the ground truth CAR region on the bottom of the scene has been segmented with coarser and irregular boundaries. Some BACKGROUND areas on the top-left that interact with the CAR region have been misclassified as CAR.
Overall, the prediction captures the ground truth PERSON region well, however, the left hand near the bottom left is missed by the prediction.

The SHEEP regions in the ground truth have been misclassified in the prediction mask, specifically, most of the regions are classified as BACKGROUND, while some areas are classified as BICYCLE and POTTEDPLANT. The ground truth DOG region has been misclassified as BICYCLE in the prediction mask. The PERSON region is generally well segmented, although the bottom part is slightly under-segmented.

The ground truth DININGTABLE region on the bottom of the scene has been segmented with somewhat inaccurate boundaries, and it tends to be slightly under-segmented towards the top, while the ground truth PERSON regions have been segmented with inaccurate boundaries.
The prediction mask for the SOFA region is incomplete and scattered. The region boundaries are inaccurate, and large portions of the sofa are missed by the segmentation.

The ground truth BOTTLE region has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries and the top part is over-segmented while the bottom part is under-segmented a bit. The BACKGROUND areas that interact with the region have been completely misclassified as BOTTLE.

The prediction of the DOG region on the center of the scene has some flaws. Specifically, some regions have been classified as SHEEP and DININGTABLE, while the DOG region boundary on the right of the scene has been over-extended and is inaccurate.

The DININGTABLE and CHAIR regions on the center of the scene have been segmented with inaccurate boundaries. The boundaries are coarse and over-extended. Also, the CHAIR regions on the upper part of the scene are incomplete in the prediction mask. The BACKGROUND areas that interact with the regions have been misclassified as CHAIR.

The ground truth POTTEDPLANT region on the right of the scene has been segmented inaccurately, most of it is missing in the prediction mask. The prediction also hallucinates a BOTTLE region on the left.
The ground truth CHAIR region has been significantly under-segmented on the left-hand side. The fingers are severely truncated.
The ground truth TRAIN region has been segmented with slightly coarser, less defined boundaries. Moreover, the prediction over-segments the region.
The prediction is under-segmented for the group of COWs on the left; the two COWs are fused as one. The single COW on the upper right is slightly under-segmented as well.

The ground truth AEROPLANE region has been segmented with somewhat inaccurate boundaries compared to the prediction mask. The prediction mask is missing the bottom left part of the plane, and the tail on the right is also smaller.

The rightmost SHEEP region has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries and the region in the middle of the leftmost SHEEP has been over-segmented. The BACKGROUND areas that interact with both of the regions have been completely misclassified as SHEEP.

The ground truth AEROPLANE region has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries. The area under the aeroplane is not classified as AEROPLANE, and a few BOAT regions have been hallucinated on the top of the aeroplane.
The ground truth BUS region has been segmented with somewhat coarser and imperfect boundaries, especially along the top edge of the bus, where the prediction mask is over-extended.

The prediction of the BOTTLE region at the bottom is inaccurate, being smaller than the ground truth. There's also significant misclassification of BACKGROUND around the bottle, and under-segmentation around the bottom of the PERSON.

The ground truth CHAIR region on the left has been misclassified as SOFA, except for the pillow region on the top, which has been classified as AEROPLANE. The ground truth PERSON region on the right has been significantly under-segmented and most of the legs have been missed. The boundary of the region is also flawed.
The CAT region in the prediction mask is missing part of the lower boundary compared to the ground truth, and there are holes in the region. The upper CAT region is slightly over-segmented.

The ground truth BIRD region on the left has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries, especially on the left wing which is significantly under-segmented. The boundary around the neck and head is also less accurate in the prediction.

The prediction only partially covers the ground truth BOAT region on the bottom right of the scene. The prediction also falsely detects BOAT regions on the top center and bottom left of the scene, which are not annotated in the ground truth.
The prediction of the BICYCLE region shows inaccurate boundaries, filling in most of the gaps and conflating the objects into a single large region.
The ground truth SOFA region has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries, and much of the region is missing. The predicted region is significantly smaller and covers only the top part of the sofa.

The prediction is significantly different from the ground truth. The ground truth BOTTLE region on the top of the scene is mostly classified as PERSON and DININGTABLE. Furthermore, the PERSON and DININGTABLE regions have been largely extended over most of the scene, with inaccurate boundaries.
The BICYCLE region has been segmented with inaccurate boundaries. The prediction mask does not capture all details of the object and tends to merge them into one big region.
